Outcome.DescriptionText: You were lied to, there isnt anything worth value here.
Your forces found recently cleared out rooms, it seems someone beat us to it. Only few things were left behind of low value.

After Scouting the area, your troops find an entrance to a hidden cave and enter it. What they find is truly astonishing; It seems that the pirates have found some interesting artifacts and created a untested tech. Unfortunately, it seems that a small remnant fleet was dawned to this place as well. The ships are attacking immediately!
